abstract: Jed S. Rakoff, the judge who made headlines after his sharp rebuke of the settlement agreement between Bank of America and the S.E.C. is now expected to oversee the agency’s insider trading case against Raj Rajaratnam.
snippet: Jed S. Rakoff, the judge who made headlines after his sharp rebuke of the settlement agreement between Bank of America and the S.E.C. is now expected to oversee the agency’s insider trading case against Raj Rajaratnam.
lead_paragraph: A judge who made headlines after his sharp rebuke of a settlement agreement between Bank of America and the Securities and Exchange Commission is expected to oversee the S.E.C.’s insider trading case against the Galleon Group‘s chief, Raj Rajaratnam, The New York Post reported.

headline.main: Case Against Galleon Draws Judge Rakoff

abstract: Bank of America is expected to announce a deal to sell First Republic Bank to a consortium of investors for about $1 billion, a person briefed on the transaction told DealBook.
snippet: Bank of America is expected to announce a deal to sell First Republic Bank to a consortium of investors for about $1 billion, a person briefed on the transaction told DealBook.
lead_paragraph: Update | 2:22 p.m. Bank of America  said Wednesday that it would sell First Republic Bank to a consortium of investors.

headline.main: Bank of America Sells First Republic Bank

abstract: The companies that received the biggest bailouts are expected to cut the salaries of their best-paid executives.
snippet: The companies that received the biggest bailouts are expected to cut the salaries of their best-paid executives.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON  Responding to the furor over executive pay at companies bailed out with taxpayer money, the Obama administration will order the firms that received the most aid to slash compensation to their highest-paid employees, an official involved in the decision said on Wednesday.

headline.main: U.S. to Order Pay Cuts at Firms That Got Most Aid
headline.print_headline: U.S. Will Order Pay Cuts At Firms With Bailout Aid

abstract: The sale will let Bank of America raise capital and unload a unit that many analysts say does not fit well into its strategy.
snippet: The sale will let Bank of America raise capital and unload a unit that many analysts say does not fit well into its strategy.
lead_paragraph: The struggling financial giant Bank of America said Wednesday that it would sell First Republic Bank to an alliance of investors.

headline.main: Bank of America Sells Republic Bank to Private Equity Firms
headline.print_headline: Bank of America Sells Republic Bank to Private Equity Firms
